resetAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset this account? The balance will be set to zero. This action cannot be undone.
resetRectaAccountDescription: This action will delete all your data and reset the onboarding. You will start from scratch, as if you had just created the account.
resetAccountConfirmationPhrase: I confirm that I want to delete all data and start from zero.
resetAccountWarningMessage: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be deleted and you will start from zero, including the onboarding.
resetAccountConfirmationMismatch: The typed text does not match the confirmation phrase.
basedOnLastMonths: Based on the average of the last {months} months
comparisonLastMonths: Comparison of last 3 months vs previous 3 months
creditCardsDescription: Manage your credit cards, limits and invoices.
closingDayHint: Day when the invoice closes. Ex: if it closes on day 7, the invoice includes purchases from day 7 of the previous month until day 6 of the current month.
payInvoiceDescription: Select the account where the money will come from to pay this invoice of
paymentAmountHint: Enter the amount paid (leave as is for full payment)
undoInvoicePaymentDescription: Are you sure you want to undo this invoice payment? The payment transactions will be deleted.
deleteOnlyThisHint: Removes only this entry from the selected invoice
deleteAllSubsequentHint: Recommended for cancelled or refunded purchases
installmentDeleteMessage: How do you want to proceed with deleting this installment purchase?
confirmDeleteTransaction: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?
projectedBalanceDescription: Includes future and recurring transactions (next 30 days)
widgetConfigDescription: Use the arrows to reorganize and click the eye icon to show/hide widgets. Click "Save" to apply changes.
resetToDefaultConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset widgets to default? All customizations will be lost.
projectionNegative: Projection indicates negative balance. Review future transactions.
projectedBalanceInfo: Includes future transactions already registered and recurring transaction projections.
trendGreat: Great trend: Income up and expenses down. Keep it up!
trendAttention: Attention: Income down and expenses up. Consider reviewing your spending.
insightsPositiveBalance: You have a positive balance this month. Keep it up!
insightsNegativeBalance: Warning! You are spending more than you earn this month.
excludesCreditDebt: Excludes credit card debts (shown separately below)
balanceEditHint: The balance cannot be edited here. If you need to correct the balance, you can delete this bank account and create a new one. The calculations will be redone automatically.
balanceAndTypeEditHint: The balance and account type cannot be edited here. If you need to change these values, you can delete this bank account and create a new one. The calculations will be redone automatically.
dayOfMonth: Day of the month when the bill is due (1-31)
baseCurrencyDescription: The base currency is used to display all values in the system. All values will be formatted in this currency.
onboardingStep1Description: We are just a few steps away from taking full control of financial life. Let's start by choosing the preferred language.
onboardingStep1Motivational: We are just a few steps away from transforming financial life! ðŸš€
onboardingStep2ThemeDescription: Do you prefer light or dark mode? Choose the one that suits you best. You can always change this later in settings.
onboardingStep3Title: What is the country and main currency?
onboardingStep3Description: We're almost there! Set up the country and currency to start transforming the relationship with money. Each step brings closer to total control of finances.
onboardingStep4Title: What would one like to be called?
onboardingStep4Description: We're building a personalized journey. This is the moment to take control and start truly changing financial life.
onboardingStep5Description: Now it's time to start! Add the first account and see how simple it is to have full visibility of money. This is the first step to transform financial life and make smarter decisions.
onboardingStep6Description: Automate financial life! Add salary and other recurring income. With this, there will be predictability and better future planning. Total control is within reach.
onboardingStep7Description: This is the step that will change everything! By setting a budget, one takes real control of finances. Stop being surprised by expenses and start living with financial purpose. The transformation is almost complete!
onboardingStep8Title: Congratulations! Ready to transform financial life! ðŸŽ‰
onboardingStep8Description: The initial setup has been completed and now there are all the tools to take full control of finances. Share this transformation journey with loved ones and help them change their financial lives too.
displayName: What would one like to be called?
displayNameDescription: We're building a personalized journey. This is the moment to take control and start truly changing financial life.
restartOnboardingDescription: Would you like to go through the initial setup process again? Your existing data will not be deleted.
youAlreadyHaveAccounts: You already have bank accounts registered:
youCanAddMoreAccounts: You can add more accounts below or skip this step.
youAlreadyHaveRecurring: You already have recurring transactions registered:
youCanAddMoreRecurring: You can add more recurring transactions below or skip this step.
noAccountsForRecurringHint: You can skip this step and create recurring transactions later in the app. Credit cards and investments don't accept recurring transactions.
youCanAddMoreBudgets: You can add more budgets below or skip this step.
budgetAlreadyExists: This budget already exists for this month
noCustomCategories: No custom categories. Create one to use in transactions and budgets.
recurringAlreadyProcessed: All active recurrences have already been processed this month. Only new recurrences will be added.
processRecurringDescription: When processing, the system will create pending transactions only for active recurrences that have not been processed this month. Understand what will happen:
processRecurringPoint1: Transactions will be created as pending (unpaid) in the current month
processRecurringPoint2: You can review and mark them as paid when you want
processRecurringPoint3: Only new recurrences will be added (already processed recurrences will be ignored)
processRecurringPoint4: Created transactions remain even if you delete the recurrence afterwards
processRecurringNoteText: You can process as many times as you want in the month. The system only adds recurrences that have not been processed yet.
invalidPassword: Password must be at least 6 characters
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete this bank account?
deleteAccountWarning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
deleteAccountTransactionsWarning: Transactions associated with this bank account will remain in your Recta account and will be debited in the balance calculation of the next bank account you create. You will need to remove these records manually if you don't want this to affect your bank balance.
typeBankAccountNameToConfirm: Type the bank account name to confirm:
nameDoesNotMatch: The typed name does not match the bank account name.
confirmDeleteBudget: Are you sure you want to delete this budget?
confirmDeleteGoal: Are you sure you want to delete this goal?
confirmDeleteRecurring: Are you sure you want to delete this recurring transaction?
categoryDeleteInUse: Cannot delete: this category is used in transactions, budgets or recurring items. Change them to another category first.
accountsDescription: Manage your bank accounts, cards and investments
creditCardInitialDebtHint: For credit cards, leave at 0 if there is no initial debt. The debt will be calculated automatically from card purchases.
recurringDescription: Manage your income and expenses that repeat automatically
goalsDescription: Set and track your savings goals to achieve your financial objectives
budgetsDescription: Control your monthly spending by setting limits per category and track your progress
recurringHelperText: Recurring transactions are automatically added on the due date. For credit cards, this means the limit is not occupied in advance, as it's a recurrence (not an installment). The transaction will only be created when the due date arrives.
accountsHelper1: New interface similar to credit cards!
accountsHelper2: Now you can view your bank accounts in a more organized way:
accountsHelper3: Account selector at the top for quick navigation
accountsHelper4: Consolidated summary with total available balance
accountsHelper5: Side card with detailed information of the selected account
accountsHelper6: Paginated transaction list for the selected month
accountsHelper8: All this to make managing your finances easier!
name: Name
privacyNoticeDescription: We make a point of not collecting any personal information from you to maintain complete confidentiality of your financial information. Your financial data is private and secure.
premiumPlanActive: You have an active Premium plan
familyPlanActive: You have an active Family plan
familyPlanDescription: Share your finances with 2 people total in the same household
familyPlanNotActive: You don't have an active Family plan
familyPlanNotActiveDescription: Subscribe to the Family plan to create and manage shared households
commandMenuPlaceholder: Type a command or search... (Cmd+K or Ctrl+K)
commandMenuDescription: Use arrows to navigate and Enter to select a command.
balanceEvolutionDescription: Accumulated balance over the months (includes what was left from the previous month)
noExpensesByCategory: No expenses by category in the period
noIncomeByCategory: No income by category in the period
loginError: Error signing in. Please try again.
referralCountDescription: Number of people who signed up using your invite link
noReferralsYet: No one has signed up using your link yet
mobileBannerMessage: You are in a browser. Our mobile app is not ready yet and this version may contain widgets that work better on desktop.
limitMustBePositive: Limit must be greater than zero
cardLimitMustBePositive: Card limit must be greater than zero
targetAmountMustBePositive: Target amount must be greater than zero
amountMustBePositive: Amount must be greater than zero
amountMustBeGreaterThanZero: Amount must be greater than zero
themeDescription: Choose between light or dark theme to customize the app appearance.
landingHeroTitle: The best solution for a healthy financial life
landingHeroSubtitle: Gather all your expenses in one app and simplify your finances with our manager.
landingFeaturesTitle: Control your finances in one place
landingFeaturesSubtitle: Taking care of your money can be simple. With our manager, you organize and plan your financial life in one place.
landingFeature1Description: Organize all your accounts and cards in one place. View your balances and credit limits clearly.
landingFeature2Title: Plan your spending and create goals
landingFeature2Description: Create monthly budgets, keep your spending under control to save money and achieve your dreams.
landingFeature3Description: Record income and expenses simply. View detailed graphs and reports about your spending.
landingFeature4Description: Set category limits together with your family or partner. Track spending in real time and avoid end-of-month surprises.
landingSecurityDescription: Recta has technical and administrative measures to protect your personal data, in accordance with data protection laws.
landingAppTitle: Take control of your financial life
landingAppDescription: Start organizing your finances today. It's free and takes just a few minutes.
landingWidgetSubtitle: Detailed charts and reports for you to understand exactly where your money goes
landingDetailedReportsDesc: Analyze your spending by category, period and more. Identify patterns and savings opportunities.
landingAutomaticInsightsDesc: Receive smart insights about your financial habits and personalized suggestions to improve your control.
landingPricingSubtitle: Choose the ideal plan for your needs. During the beta period, all plans are 100% free.
landingPricingNote: All plans include automatic updates and new features during the beta period.
landingSeoDescription: Gather all your expenses in one app and simplify your finances with Recta
versionUpdateDescription: We've updated Recta with improvements and fixes. Click the button below to load the latest version.
installAppDescription: Install the app for quick access and better experience
pwaInfoDescription: You can now install Recta on your phone or computer's home screen for quick access and a better experience!
pwaInfoMobileDescription: Tap the browser menu and select "Add to Home Screen"
pwaInfoDesktopDescription: Click the install icon in the address bar or browser menu
pwaInfoBenefit: Quick access and native app-like experience!
whatsNewIntro: We're introducing planning mode for more than one person! Recta Web is free and will continue to be free.
whatsNewTransactionsTitle: Recta Duo: planning for more than one person
whatsNewTransactions1: Create a shared household from the selector at the bottom, near the logout button
whatsNewTransactions2: Invite another person by email to manage finances together
whatsNewTransactions3: Split expenses among members when creating or editing a transaction
whatsNewCategories1: Register your own categories in Settings > My categories, for income and expenses.
whatsNewCategories2: Use your categories in transactions, budgets and recurring items to organize your way.
whatsNewControls1: More robust and organized category system
whatsNewControls2: Smart filters for more detailed analysis
whatsNewCards1: Enhanced visualization of invoices and limits
whatsNewCards2: More precise control of allocations and balances
whatsNewCards3: Better management of due dates and closings
whatsNewRecurring1: Smarter and more accurate processing of recurring transactions
whatsNewPerformance1: Faster loading of pages and data
whatsNewMigrationText: Recta Web is and will continue to be free. No hidden costs.
whatsNewMigrationRecommendation: I recommend that you review 100% of your main data (transactions, accounts, and budgets) to ensure everything is still correct. If you find any inconsistencies, the easiest process may be to edit or delete the occurrence and register a new one.
whatsNewUnderstand: I understand and have read all the information above
pwaInstallNotAvailable: Installation not available at the moment. Check the instructions in settings.
verifyEmailDescription: We've sent a verification email to your registered email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to validate your account.
emailNotVerified: Email not verified yet. Please check your email and try again.
obviousFakeEmailError: Please use a real email address (emails like test.com are not allowed).
deleteAccountDescription: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
deleteUserAccountWarning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data, including transactions, bank accounts, budgets, and goals will be permanently deleted.
confirmPassword: Enter your password to confirm deletion:
confirmPasswordHint: You need to confirm your password to delete your Recta account for security purposes.
googleAccountDeleteInfo: You logged in with Google. Click "Delete Account" to confirm deletion. You will need to confirm your Google account again.
confirmEmailHint: You need to confirm your email to delete your Recta account for security purposes.
requiresRecentLogin: Please logout and login again before deleting your account. This is required for security.
emailDoesNotMatch: The email entered does not match your email.
accountAndCreditCardRequired: Account and credit card are required
fromAccountRequired: From and to accounts are required
sameAccountError: Cannot transfer to the same account
feedbackRatingLabel: From 1 to 5 stars, how would you rate it?
feedbackPlaceholder: Tell us about your experience using Recta...
feedbackSuccess: Thank you for sharing your experience!
feedbackError: Please select a rating from 1 to 5 stars
selectMonthDescription: Select the month to view dashboard data
accountOrCardRequired: Please select an account or card to move money. It's not possible to create transactions without an associated account.
pleaseSplitExpense: Please split the expense among household members.
splitSumMustEqualTotal: The sum of splits must equal the total amount.
noAccountsAvailableMessage: Cannot create transactions without at least one account, card or cash account registered. Please create an account first.
splitInsufficientBalance: Insufficient balance. The account has {{available}} available, but the amount is {{amount}}.
youDontHavePersonalAccounts: You do not have personal accounts yet. Create accounts in your personal household to share them.
currentPlanSupportsUpTo: The current plan (Family) supports up to {{max}} members per household. You already have {{current}} active {{currentLabel}}.
youWereAddedToHousehold: You were added to the household "{{name}}"!
youHaveNoUnreadNotifications: You have no unread notifications at the moment. When you receive invitations, budget alerts or other notifications, they will appear here.
youHaveNoPendingInvites: You have no pending, accepted or rejected invitations. When someone invites you to a household, invitations will appear here.
youCanInviteAnotherPerson: You can invite another person to manage finances together in this household. For now, only one shared household per user is allowed.
selectAccountOrCreateBeforeRecurring: Select an account or create an account before creating a recurring transaction.
sharePersonalAccountsDescription: To share your personal bank accounts and credit cards, you need to be viewing the shared household. Go to the household selector above and select the shared household, then open this modal again.
selectPersonalAccountsToShare: Select which of your personal accounts you want to share with other members of this household. Only selected accounts can be used by other members when creating shared transactions. Each member selects their own accounts individually.
inviteMemberHint: The invited person does not receive an email. Enter the email of a user who already has a Recta account.
confirmRemoveMember: Are you sure you want to remove {{email}}?
deleteHouseholdConfirm: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone. All accounts, cards, transactions, budgets and goals in this household will be permanently deleted â€” including balances and history. This effectively reverts everything recorded in it. You will be able to create or join another household afterwards.
deleteHouseholdDescription: Deleting this household removes accounts, cards, transactions, balances and all related data. Use it if you want to leave it to create or join another.
leaveHouseholdDescription: You will no longer have access to this household. The owner can invite you again later.
confirmLeaveHousehold: Are you sure you want to leave this household? The owner can invite you again.
personalAccountsSharedSuccess: Now other members can use your personal accounts in this household
personalAccountsRevoked: Access to your personal accounts has been revoked
noAccountsShared: No accounts shared. Other members will not be able to use your personal accounts.
confirmCancelInvite: Are you sure you want to cancel the invite for {{email}}?
maintenanceMessage1: The app is undergoing a migration to add important new features.
maintenanceMessage2: Thank you for your understanding and patience during this period.
pleaseScrollToEndToContinue: Please scroll to the end to continue
noBudgetForThisMonth: No budget set for this month
monthlyRecapSubtitle: Let's see how your financial month went!
monthlyRecapQuizTopCategoryQuestion: What was the category you spent the most on this month?
monthlyRecapQuizLargestExpenseQuestion: What was your largest single expense this month?
monthlyRecapQuizBalanceQuestion: What was the final balance for the month?
monthlyRecapQuizPerfect: Perfect! You know your finances well!
monthlyRecapQuizGood: Good job! Keep tracking your expenses!
monthlyRecapQuizKeepGoing: Don't give up! Keep tracking to improve!
monthlyRecapNextMonthSubtitle: Keep tracking your finances and see your next recap at the end of the month.
monthlyRecapNavigationHint: Use arrows or click buttons to navigate
reportInsightExcellentSavingsRateDescrip: You are saving {percent}% of your income. Keep it up!
reportInsightGoodSavingsRateDescription: You are saving {percent}% of your income. To improve, try to reach 20% or more.
reportInsightNegativeSavingsRateDescript: You are spending {percent}% more than you earn. Review your expenses.
reportInsightHealthyGrowthDescription: Income increased {incomePercent}% and expenses grew only {expensePercent}%.
insightExcellentSavingsRateDescription: You are saving {percent}% of your income. Keep it up! The recommendation is to maintain at least 20%.
insightGoodSavingsRateDescription: You are saving {percent}% of your income. To improve, try to reach 20% or more.
insightLowSavingsRateDescription: You are saving only {percent}% of your income. Consider reducing expenses or increasing income to improve your financial health.
insightNegativeSavingsRateDescription: You are spending {percent}% more than you earn. This is not sustainable. Review your expenses urgently.
insightIncomeIncreaseDescription: Your income increased {percent}% compared to the previous month. {amount} received this month.
insightIncomeDecreaseDescription: Your income decreased {percent}% compared to the previous month. Consider reviewing income sources.
insightExpenseIncreaseDescription: Your expenses increased {percent}% ({amount} more). Review categories that grew the most.
insightExpenseDecreaseDescription: You reduced your expenses by {percent}%! Keep maintaining this control.
insightDominantCategoryDescription: {category} represents {percent}% of your expenses ({amount}). Consider diversifying or optimizing.
insightMajorCategoryDescription: {category} is your top category this month: {amount} ({percent}% of total).
insightStrongEmergencyFundDescription: Your positive balance covers {months} months of expenses. Excellent for unexpected events!
insightDecentEmergencyFundDescription: Your positive balance covers {months} month{plural} of expenses. Ideally have at least 3 months.
insightCriticalNegativeBalanceDescriptio: You spent {amount} more than you received. This indicates an urgent need for financial adjustment.
insightHealthyGrowthDescription: Income growing more than expenses. Your balance improved {percent}% - keep on this path!
forecastGoodMessage: Positive forecast. Keep controlling your expenses.
forecastWarningMessage: Positive forecast, but low savings rate. Consider optimizing.
forecastCriticalMessage: Attention: Forecast indicates negative balance. Review your expenses.
forecastNote: Based on recurring transactions and last month's pattern. Values may vary.
noBudgetForMonth: No budget set for this month
fixedExpensesInsight: More than 70% of your expenses are fixed. Consider reviewing recurring commitments to increase financial flexibility.
negativeProjectionMessage: Based on the current pace, your balance may become negative by the end of the month. Consider reducing expenses.
